Package com.appnexus.opensdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdListener
    Implement this interface to create a class which can react to ad events.
    AdRequester  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdRequest  
    AdView
    The parent class of InterstitialAdView and BannerAdView.
    BannerAdView
    This view is added to an existing layout in order to display ads.
    InstallTrackerPixel  
    InterstitialAdView
    This class controls loading and displaying interstitial ads.
